name: concrete floor
description: A bare and cold concrete floor with matching roof, could still insulate from the outdoors but roof collapse is possible if supporting walls are broken down.

name: concrete floor
description: A bare and cold concrete floor with a streak of yellow paint, could still insulate from the outdoors but roof collapse is possible if supporting walls are broken down.

name: concrete floor
description: A bare and cold concrete floor with a streak of red paint, could still insulate from the outdoors but roof collapse is possible if supporting walls are broken down.

name: concrete floor
description: A bare and cold concrete floor with painted stripes of black and yellow, could still insulate from the outdoors but roof collapse is possible if supporting walls are broken down.

name: concrete floor
description: A bare and cold concrete floor with a streak of yellow paint and a still-functioning light attached to the ceiling above, could still insulate from the outdoors but roof collapse is possible if supporting walls are broken down.

name: concrete floor, overhead light
description: A bare and cold concrete floor with a still-functioning light attached to the ceiling above.

name: wooden floor, overhead light
description: Interlocking wooden tiles that are more than likely treated against fire, with a still-functioning light attached to the ceiling above.

name: brick floor
description: A relatively flat area made of tightly placed bricks.

name: dirt floor, overhead light
description: A floor consisting of finely mixed earth that has been tamped down, with a still-functioning light attached to the ceiling above.

name: metal floor, with overhead light
description: High-quality and tough checkered metal flooring to reduce the risk of slips and falls, with a still-functioning light attached to the ceiling above.

name: strong concrete floor, overhead light
description: An extremely resilient floor made from carefully placed rebar and poured concrete, with a still-functioning light attached to the ceiling above.

name: gray linoleum floor, overhead light
description: Linoleum flooring with a still-functioning light attached to the ceiling above.

name: white linoleum floor, overhead light
description: Linoleum flooring with a still-functioning light attached to the ceiling above.

name: small rebar roof cage
description: A series of structural supports crafted from rebar in order to allow the pouring of concrete for a more stable floor and roof.

name: reinforced concrete floor
description: An extremely resilient floor made from carefully placed rebar and poured concrete, capable of providing protection from the elements.  As for the matching roof, it still requires supporting walls, otherwise it may very well cave in.

name: fractured concrete floor
description: Thin strands of violet light shimmer in the air above this concrete floor, like cracks upon a pane of glass.

name: rebar roof cage
description: A network of architecturally sound rebar in order to support a floor and roof, looks like it's missing the poured concrete.

name: half-built reinforced concrete floor
description: An unfinished construction of rebar and poured concrete; the floor hasn't been smoothed and the roof isn't quite filled in yet.

name: rock floor
description: A relatively flat area of rock and stone.  Looks stable enough to be mined with the proper mining gear.

name: marble floor
description: A smooth and flat flooring made of marble tiles.  Beautiful and expensive.

name: warped stone floor
description: A rough stone floor.  Its patterns constantly shift as if your mind can't quite understand what it's really seeing.

name: metal floor
description: High-quality and tough checkered metal flooring to reduce the risk of slips and falls, with a matching roof.

name: broken metal floor
description: Something has cratered this metal flooring.  It will be difficult to move things across.

name: floor
description: Interlocking wooden tiles that are more than likely treated against fire, with wooden posts and beams supporting a roof.

name: primitive floor
description: A timber floor and supports, holding up a sod roof.

name: simple metal floor
description: A crudely welded-together metal floor with steel trusses and supporting girders.

name: waxed floor
description: Hardwood flooring that has been treated with chemicals to improve slip resistance and sliding, commonly for recreational sports.

name: dirt floor
description: A floor consisting of finely mixed earth that has been tamped down, with a wooden ceiling above it.

name: dirt floor
description: A floor consisting of finely mixed earth that has been tamped down, with a thatched roof above it.

name: metal grate
description: A walkway that can be used as a protective covering over drains, or even as a filter.

name: utility light
description: An industrial floodlight set up to illuminate the surroundings.  Smashing it doesn't seem like it'd produce any worthwhile salvage.

name: wax floor
description: A floor section made entirely out of wax.

name: elevator
description: The interior section of an elevator.

description: A red section of flooring.

name: painted waxed floor

name: radiation platform
description: A dual-purpose platform that exposes items placed on it to a radioactive source by temporarily hoisting the radioactive material stored within, while also safely containing all objects to avoid contaminating its surroundings.  Operated from an external console.

name: junk metal floor
description: A simple roof and floor of rusty scrap metal bolted and wire-tied to a makeshift frame.  Very fashionable in post-apocalyptic shantytowns.  Hope you like the sound of rain on corrugated metal.

//: for caverns and other natural underground formations.
name: dirt
description: It's dirt.  Looks like some fine soil for tillage.  Could also be dug out for construction projects.

name: sand
//: for caverns and other natural underground formations.
description: A large area of fine sand that could be useful in a number of ways, if it was extracted properly.

name: paper floor
description: A floor made of ambiguous pulpy matter, covered in sticky wasp saliva.

name: hard paper floor
description: A hardened cardboard floor made of chewed-up trees and resin mixed with wasp saliva.

name: paper brood cap
description: A thin paper floor, protecting the pupating wasp larva until it's ready to emerge.

name: open air
description: An area of open air.
//: Actually, this is a thin membrane of bullshit to keep wasp eggs levitating.
